short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An easy to use extension to help you stay focused on productivity by blocking you out of the most popular entertainment websites:)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When Trying to access distracting websites Mr.Focus will redirect the page telling you to stay on track with your daily tasks. You also have the ability to set reminders for your self through the extensions popup. If you want to be more productive everyday install the Mr.Focus chrome extension.
